name: PLAYER KELLER BETA (MecanicStudio)
description: This is a 2D game that tells an astronaut called Marcos and you need to save the world , you need to find the sphere of the world each world has its own  sphere the game has only one phase the level 1  How to play  the keyboard arrows move the character  the X key jumps  the C key shoots  the C key when touching the lever press the C key to activate the lever  leave your feedbacks down below
